name: Pheonix Spice
flavor: Enough scovilles to literally breathe fire.

purposeDescriptions.low: imbues a peppery kick into affected food, which causes anyone who consumes it to let out a loud smoky belch a moment later
purposeDescriptions.mid: imbues a firey haymaker-spice into affected food, causing anyone who consumes it to let out a meter-long jet of flame a moment later
purposeDescriptions.high: instills a mind-destroyingly strong spice into affect food, causing anyone who consumes it to let out a painful ten meter jet of flame
purposeDescriptions.invLow: suffuses a minty freshness into affected food, which causes anyone who consumes it to let out a cold, teeth-chattering breath a moment later
purposeDescriptions.invMid: suffuses an icey mint taste into affected food, causing anyone who consumes it to let out a blast of sub-zero ice shards a moment later
purposeDescriptions.invHigh: instills a mind-numbingly strong mint into affected food, causing anyone who consumes it to let out a jet of supercooled ice and air
